participant_1.background:
My memories of my grandmother, who used to make the best mac and cheese in the world.
I do my laundry once a week, because that is enough to keep my clothes clean and fresh.
i am not a basketball player though.
my favorite place is the mountains.
i am married with 5 kids.

participant_2.background:
I'm glad I have such fond memories of fishing with my dad.
i can t live without my friends.
i teach kindergarten.
I would not be able to be a personal trainer if I were blind because I would not be able to see my clients' form and correct them.
I have a close relationship with my family despite my hectic schedule.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
Doing well, thanks for asking. I have a lot of fond memories of my grandmother, too.
Me too! What kind of memories do you have of your grandmother?
She used to make the best mac and cheese in the world! I can still taste it.
Wow, that sounds amazing! I'm not much of a cook myself, but I love eating.
I love anything with cheese! I'm also a big fan of pasta.
Me too! I love a good pasta dish.
What's your favorite kind of pasta?
I'm a big fan of penne. It's so versatile and can be used in so many different dishes.
I love penne too! It's one of my favorites.
Have you ever had penne with a pesto sauce?
No, I haven't! What's that like?
It's really good! It's made with basil, pine nuts, and olive oil.
That sounds delicious! I'll have to try it sometime.
